verses.esv: 33 But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
verses.kjv: 33 But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
verses.niv: 33 But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

verses.esv:
8   You have said, “Seek my face.”
  My heart says to you,
    “Your face, LORD, do I seek.”
verses.kjv: 8 When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, LORD, will I seek.
verses.niv: 8 My heart says of you, "Seek his face!" Your face, LORD, I will seek.

verses.esv: 8 For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.
verses.kjv: 8 For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
verses.niv: 8 For everyone who asks receives; he who seeks finds; and to him who knocks, the door will be opened.

verses.esv: 13 You will seek me and find me, when you seek me with all your heart.
verses.kjv: 13 And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
verses.niv: 13 You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

verses.esv: 29 But from there you will seek the LORD your God and you will find him, if you search after him with all your heart and with all your soul.
verses.kjv: 29 But if from thence thou shalt seek the LORD thy God, thou shalt find him, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy soul.
verses.niv: 29 But if from there you seek the LORD your God, you will find him if you look for him with all your heart and with all your soul.

verses.esv: 7 “Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
verses.kjv: 7 Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:
verses.niv: 7 "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.

verses.esv:
10   And those who know your name put their trust in you,
    for you, O LORD, have not forsaken those who seek you.
verses.kjv: 10 And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
verses.niv: 10 Those who know your name will trust in you, for you, LORD, have never forsaken those who seek you.

verses.esv: 3:1 If then you have been raised with Christ, seek the things that are above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.
verses.kjv: 1 If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
verses.niv: 1 Since, then, you have been raised with Christ, set your hearts on things above, where Christ is seated at the right hand of God.

verses.esv:
17   I love those who love me,
    and those who seek me diligently find me.
verses.kjv: 17 I love them that love me; and those that seek me early shall find me.
verses.niv: 17 I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv:
A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah.

63:1   O God, you are my God; earnestly I seek you;
    my soul thirsts for you;
  my flesh faints for you,
    as in a dry and weary land where there is no water.
verses.kjv: 1 O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
verses.niv: 1 O God, you are my God, earnestly I seek you; my soul thirsts for you, my body longs for you, in a dry and weary land where there is no water.

verses.esv:
11   Seek the LORD and his strength;
    seek his presence continually!
verses.kjv: 11 Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.
verses.niv: 11 Look to the LORD and his strength; seek his face always.

verses.esv:
2   The LORD looks down from heaven on the children of man,
    to see if there are any who understand,
    who seek after God.
verses.kjv: 2 The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
verses.niv: 2 The LORD looks down from heaven on the sons of men to see if there are any who understand, any who seek God.

verses.esv:
10   The young lions suffer want and hunger;
    but those who seek the LORD lack no good thing.
verses.kjv: 10 The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
verses.niv: 10 The lions may grow weak and hungry, but those who seek the LORD lack no good thing.

verses.esv:
2   Blessed are those who keep his testimonies,
    who seek him with their whole heart,
verses.kjv: 2 Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
verses.niv: 2 Blessed are they who keep his statutes and seek him with all their heart.

verses.esv: 14 if my people who are called by my name humble themselves, and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then I will hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and heal their land.
verses.kjv: 14 If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.
verses.niv: 14 if my people, who are called by my name, will humble themselves and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then will I hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and will heal their land.

verses.esv:
4   Seek the LORD and his strength;
    seek his presence continually!
verses.kjv: 4 Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.
verses.niv: 4 Look to the LORD and his strength; seek his face always.

verses.esv: 9 And I tell you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you. 10 For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.
verses.kjv: 9 And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you. 10 For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
verses.niv: 9 "So I say to you: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you. 10 For everyone who asks receives; he who seeks finds; and to him who knocks, the door will be opened.

verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.

verses.esv: 27 that they should seek God, and perhaps feel their way toward him and find him. Yet he is actually not far from each one of us,
verses.kjv: 27 That they should seek the Lord, if haply they might feel after him, and find him, though he be not far from every one of us:
verses.niv: 27 God did this so that men would seek him and perhaps reach out for him and find him, though he is not far from each one of us.

verses.esv: 7 “Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you. 8 For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.
verses.kjv: 7 Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you: 8 For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
verses.niv: 7 "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you. 8 For everyone who asks receives; he who seeks finds; and to him who knocks, the door will be opened.

verses.esv:
25   The LORD is good to those who wait for him,
    to the soul who seeks him.
verses.kjv: 25 The LORD is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him.
verses.niv: 25 The LORD is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him;

verses.esv:
4 For thus says the LORD to the house of Israel:

  “Seek me and live;
verses.kjv: 4 For thus saith the LORD unto the house of Israel, Seek ye me, and ye shall live:
verses.niv: 4 This is what the LORD says to the house of Israel: "Seek me and live;

verses.esv:
6   “Seek the LORD while he may be found;
    call upon him while he is near;
verses.kjv: 6 Seek ye the LORD while he may be found, call ye upon him while he is near:
verses.niv: 6 Seek the LORD while he may be found; call on him while he is near.

verses.esv:
6   “Seek the LORD while he may be found;
    call upon him while he is near;
7   let the wicked forsake his way,
    and the unrighteous man his thoughts;
  let him return to the LORD, that he may have compassion on him,
    and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.
verses.kjv: 6 Seek ye the LORD while he may be found, call ye upon him while he is near: 7 Let the wicked forsake his way, and the unrighteous man his thoughts: and let him return unto the LORD, and he will have mercy upon him; and to our God, for he will abundantly pardon.
verses.niv: 6 Seek the LORD while he may be found; call on him while he is near. 7 Let the wicked forsake his way and the evil man his thoughts. Let him turn to the LORD, and he will have mercy on him, and to our God, for he will freely pardon.
